{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Motorola |model=MG7700 |fcc_date=02/08/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Zoom |availability=unreleased |type=cable modem, wireless router |fcc_id=2AF5PMGMT77 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM3384ZU;BROADCOM, QAMLink (R), BCM3384ZUKFSBG, CN1645 P20, 643710 N3A W; |ram1_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |sw_brand=Broadcom |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |flags=256QAM, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=MOTOXXXX, MOTOXXXX-5G, |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=motorola }}
:• '''1300Mbps''' - 3SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''600Mbps''' - 3SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''1900 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|24x8 Cable Modem plus AC1900 Router}} DOCSIS 3.0 24x8 channels{{CableModemSpec |down_c=24 |up_c=8 }} ===See also=== *[[List of DOCSIS Cable Modems]]
